message.name: TEST_DATA
message.description: This message will send a single byte of data for debugging.
message.field: Holds raw data for use in testing

message.name: XBEE_HEARTBEAT
message.description: This message will send a single byte that will count and check that xbee is alive.
message.field: TRUE if we want an ACK return FALSE else
Holds raw data for use in testing

message.name: MAVLINK_ACK
message.description: This messages will send a sinlge byte with the mavlink message id
message.field: Returns the name of message recieved

message.name: GPS_NED_ERROR
message.description: This messages will send the correction for the local GPS area
message.field: TRUE if we want an ACK return FALSE else
North Error amount
East Error amount

message.name: START_RESCUE
message.description: This messages will send a GPS location to the boat
message.field: TRUE if we want an ACK return FALSE else
Holds status informatiom for the boat
Latitude data for the boat to travel to
Longitude data for the boat to travel to

message.name: STOP_RESCUE
message.description: This messages will send a sinlge byte with the mavlink message id
message.field: TRUE if we want an ACK return FALSE else
Holds a Message ID number

message.name: GPS_GEO_ORIGIN
message.description: This message will contain the LAT/LONG GPS DATA
message.field: TRUE if we want an ACK return FALSE else
Holds a Message ID number
Longitude data for the boat to travel to

message.name: BAROMETER_DATA
message.description: This message will contain the data from the Barometer(Temp, altitude, pressure)
message.field: TRUE if we want an ACK return FALSE else
Contains the temperature in celcius
Contains the temperature in Fahrenheit
Contains the pressure data from the barometer
Contains the altitude calculated from the barometer
